Question.Subject: is there a way to trace the origins of a picture...?
Question.Content:
I don't really know how to ask this...but...I suppose I'll start by trying to give a scenario;
let's say...someone steals a picture of mine of off facebook or myspace or WHATEVER. they show it to someone else who has no connections to me whatsoever.
is there a way for that person to trace that picture and find it somewhere on the internet? only having that said picture as a resource.
like...you know?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Try http://tineye.com. It will do a reverse image search for you.

Answer.Content: Try http://tineye.com. It will do a reverse image search for you.
